Description: Writing project scope, basic objectives, and a 1-2 paragraph description.
Creating the GitHub/GitHub Pages site where project reports will be published.
Research on wearable gesture recognition systems and similar military applications.
Writing economic, environmental, social constraints and ethical responsibilities.
Creating project task list and timeline.
Drawing system models, scenarios, and use case diagrams.
ESP32-S3, Flex sensors, IMU and RF modules procurement.
Writing basic code to read Flex and IMU data via ESP32.
Revising task list after analysis phase.
Architectural design, subsystem decomposition and hardware/software mapping.
Determining the structure of the model (CNN/RNN) to be used for gesture classification.
Testing audio playback via DFPlayer Mini and data transmission via RF.
Planning for implementation phase after design.
Physical mounting of sensors and circuit components on the glove.
Live testing of the system and preparation of poster/presentation materials.
Optimizing sensor calibration data for different hand sizes.
